gigya_raas_conf.label: Registration-as-a-Service
gigya_raas_conf.comment: RaaS requires initial configuration in Gigya's Admin Console. Screen sets can be defined in the UI Builder. The page will display a list of predefined default screen-sets, each with an ID. Click on the "Visual Editor" link next to the screen-set that you want to use, this will open the Visual Editor window. You can modify the screens, or just hit the "Save" button to activate them. Please make sure that the screen-set IDs that are defined below match the IDs of the screen-sets you have configured in the UI Builder page.'

override_links.label: Override Magento links
override_links.comment: When set to yes, the Magento default "Login", "Registration" and "Edit Profile" links pop-up RaaS screens instead of Magento screens.

div_ids_title.comment: Specify the DIV IDs in which to embed the screen-sets. If the IDs are empty (default), then the screen-set would show as pop-up dialogs.
